page.title: 20INTO THE FUTURE
page.content: The village of Middleton Cheney is in a limited development area,which means that only 100 new houses can be built between now and the year 2000. However,the area is hoping to expand when the proposed extension to the M40 motorway comes to Banbury in the next few years.Therefore there is likely to be some conflict of interests.It is expected that the amount of new house development,and land prices will increase.This will put pressure on farm land and it is thought that much speculative buying could be taking place. The proposed M40 should bring more prosperity to the area,changing its character from rural to dormitory. A further development is the long awaited Middleton bypass.Community life is bound to change.....
